title: Are You Using Android Pay Yet?
description: Learn more about Android Pay -   Are you currently using Android Pay? The process may be simpler than you think. Scanning credit cards into Android Pay is acheived by simply snapping a photo of the card within the app. Once the card is attached just tap your phone on a capable pay terminal.  This video was sponsored by Google #ad  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
